seo.seoDescription: Fast. Decentralized. Scalable. Energy efficient. Solana can power thousands of transactions per second.

options.body: Bring blockchain to the people. Solana supports experiences for power users, new consumers, and everyone in between.
options.headline: Powerful for developers. Fast for everyone.

options.eyebrow: Powering tools and integrations from companies all around the world

slides.label: NEWS
slides.headline: Solana Accelerate brings together 3000+ founders, devs, and policymakers in NYC
slides.body: Watch any talk you missed on YouTube covering the latest in crypto product and policy in America.

slides.label: DEVELOPERS
slides.headline: Solana Attestation Service is now live
slides.body: Learn how to privately verify off-chain data associated with any wallet using the new open source, permissionless protocol to attest to anything in this blog from the Solana Foundation and Solana Identity Group.

slides.label: INSTITUTIONS
slides.headline: The Block: Franklin Templeton Extends Franklin Onchain U.S. Government Money Fund to Solana
slides.body: Users can access the fund, otherwise known as FOBXX, using Franklin Templeton's BENJI platform.

slides.label: DEVELOPERS
slides.body: The report also states that 81% of all DEX transactions come from the Solana ecosystem.
slides.headline: Electric Capital: Solana Fastest Growing Ecosystem for New Builders

slides.label: PAYMENTS
slides.body: Introducing Onchain Holiday: an online Solana-powered shopping event running from that allows users to spend their stablecoins and memecoins on merchandise from over a dozen brands and retailers.
slides.headline: Solana Ecosystem Announces 'Onchain Holiday'

cards.body: Don’t keep your users waiting. Solana has block times of 400 milliseconds — and as hardware gets faster, so will the network.
Get big, quick. Solana is made to handle thousands of transactions per second, and fees for both developers and users remain less than $0.0025.
The Solana network is validated by thousands of nodes that operate independently of each other, ensuring your data remains secure and censorship resistant.
Solana’s proof of stake network and other innovations minimize its impact on the environment. Each Solana transaction uses about the same energy as a few Google searches.

cards.heading: XP
cards.body: XP aims to save consumers from high event ticket fees using Solana.

cards.heading: Boba Guys
cards.body: Boba Guys used a Solana-powered loyalty program to increase monthly sales by 67%.

cards.heading: Homebase
cards.body: Homebase used the Solana blockchain to successfully tokenized a single-family rental property.

cards.heading: Hivemapper
cards.body: Hivemapper decentralizes mapping with better real-time data and community incentives

button.label: Learn more about Payments on Solana

switcherCards.description: Solana Pay is now available to millions of businesses as an approved app integration on Shopify. Solana Pay is built for immediate USDC transactions, fees that are fractions of a penny, and a net-zero environmental impact.

button.label: Learn more about Gaming on Solana

switcherCards.description: Play and own. Bladerite, a free-to-play melee battle royale game, uses Solana to power its in-game item ownership system.

button.label: Learn more about NFTs on Solana

switcherCards.description: It’s time to bridge the digital and physical. Anybodies helps established brands like Toys’R’Us connect real-life places and products with NFTs.

button.label: Learn more about DeFi on Solana

switcherCards.description: The Solana community came together to build an open-source order book which can power decentralized finance for everyone.

button.label: Learn more about DAOs on Solana

switcherCards.description: A decentralized organization made up of NFT holders, MonkeDAO has already started running a validator node to support the Solana network — and has big plans for the future.

options.text: Join a thriving community.

cards.body: Solana Hacker House participants

cards.heading: Solana Mobile Announcement
cards.body: Users, developers, and reporters were on the scene when Solana Labs announced the Solana Mobile Stack and Saga device in June 2022.

cards.heading: Solana Breakpoint 2022
cards.body: 3,800 builders. 3 days. 1 community. Teams from around the world gathered in Lisbon in Nov. 2022 to learn, build, and celebrate at the annual conference from the Solana Foundation.

cards.heading: New York Hacker House
cards.body: Start spreading the news. Lines were out the door at the Solana Foundation’s New York Hacker House in March 2022.
Developers building during Solana Hackathons

cards.heading: Seoul Hacker House
cards.body: Let’s build! Local devs came to the Solana Foundation’s Seoul Hacker House ahead of Korea Blockchain Week 2022.
Total Solana Breakpoint attendees

cards.heading: London Hacker House
cards.body: Builders joined London Hacker House, a five-day offline event in June 2022, with advice and support from core Solana Lab engineers.

cards.heading: Seoul Hacker House
cards.body: Let’s build! Local devs came to the Solana Foundation’s Seoul Hacker House ahead of Korea Blockchain Week 2022.

cards.heading: New Delhi Hacker House
cards.body: Vibe. Mint. Build. Thousands of developers came to build together at the Sept. 2022 New Delhi Solana Hacker House.
Monthly active programs

cards.heading: Solana Miami
cards.body: New and native users came to Solana Miami in April 2022 to build, learn, and see real world Solana use cases.

options.heading: It's time to join the thousands of creators, artists, and developers using Solana.
